CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** Link to the related plan that controls Activation and Expiration dates related to any Subscription Item. Required when the Sales Order Line is linked to a Item that is the child of a "Subscription" Item Class.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** Link to the related plan that controls Activation and Expiration dates related to any Subscription Item. Required when the Sales Order Line is linked to a Item that is the child of a "Subscription" Item Class.
CustomField.label: Subscription Plan
